channel.title: math.KT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.KT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Model-theoretic $K_1$ for modules over semisimple rings: (weak) Morita invariance
item.description: arXiv:2511.05180v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: This paper is a sequel to a paper by the same authors, where they defined $K$-groups of model-theoretic structures, and computed $K_1$ of free modules over PIDs. In this paper, we compute $K_1$ of a right $M_q(R)$-module $M$, where $R$ is a division ring, $q\geq1$, and $|M_q(R)|\neq 2$. As a consequence, we obtain a (weak) Morita invariance $K_1(R_R)\cong K_1((M_q(R))_{M_q(R)})$ for all division rings $R$ and $q\geq 1$. Finally, we compute $K_1$ of a module over a semisimple ring by showing that the model-theoretic $K_1$ commutes with finite product of modules. We also show that the algebraic $K_1$ of a finite product of infinite matrix rings embeds into the model-theoretic $K_1$ of their right regular modules.
item.dc:creator: Sourayan Banerjee, Amit Kuber

item.title: Stability of the $C^q_i$ properties under field extensions
item.description: arXiv:2511.05201v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: In this paper we study the stability of variations of Kato-Kuzumaki's $C_i^q$ property under transcendental and algebraic field extensions. As an application, we obtain the $C_n^1$ property for the field ${\bf F}_p(x_1,\dots,x_n)$.
item.dc:creator: Felipe Gambardella, Harry C. Shaw
